lnext_description.message: Add OpenSearch for websites to make searching through websites easy and fast by using the Space or Tab in the address bar.

page_welcome_custom_description.message:
Customize the method that oSearch works.
If you don't know what that means, just select Default

page_welcome_terms.message:
Thanks for downloading oSearch.
To continue, it will connect to oSearch for the necessary information,

page_popup_more.message: To find out which sites osearch supports, please visit
